card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.name: Axe of Khazad-dum
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. While bearer is at a mountain site, he is damage +1.

card.name: Battle to the Last
card.property: Spot a Dwarf. For each wound on that Dwarf, make him strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Dwarven Embassy
card.property: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each companion is damage +1. Discard this condition at the end of your turn.

card.name: Fallen Lord
card.property: Exert the Ring-bearer and a Dwarf to make that Dwarf strength +X, where X equals that Dwarf's resistance.

card.name: Farin
card.property: While Farin is at a battleground or underground site, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Skirmish: If bearer is Gimli and he is at a battleground site, exert him to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Grimir
card.property: Response: If a [Dwarven] companion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 [Dwarven] cards from play (except characters) to prevent that.

card.name: Hall of Our Fathers
card.property: When you play this condition, stack the top 8 cards of your draw deck here. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot a Dwarf to exchange the cards stacked here with your hand.

card.name: Mountain Homestead
card.property: To play, spot 2 Dwarf companions. While the fellowship is at a mountain site, each Dwarf is strength +2.

card.name: On Guard
card.property: If a Dwarf who has resistance 3 or more is about to take a wound, prevent that.

card.name: Well-equipped
card.property: Discard a [Dwarven] card from hand to play a [Dwarven] possession from your draw deck on a [Dwarven] companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -1 for each forest site on the adventure path.

card.name: Blade of Lindon
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. While bearer is at a forest or river site, each minion he or she is skirmishing is strength -1.

card.name: Elven Marksmanship
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Toil 2. (For each [Elven] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.name: Elven Scout
card.property: While you can spot another Elf, this companion has muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Farewell to Lorien
card.property: Spot an Elf to heal each companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.name: The Lady
card.property: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 at a river site).

card.name: Legolas
card.property: While Legolas is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +2 and resistance +2.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: At the start of the archery phase, you may spot another Elf to exert a minion.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer. If bearer is Legolas, each time you exert him to play an [Elven] condition or [Elven] event, you may heal him (limit once per phase).

card.name: Might of the Elf-lords
card.property: Exert an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If that card's twilight cost is 3 or less, make a minion strength -3.

card.name: Nocked
card.property: Exert an Elf who has resistance 4 or more to wound a minion.

card.name: Uncertain Future
card.property: When you play this condition, spot an Elf to add 3 [Elven] tokens here. Maneuver: Discard this condition or remove an [Elven] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may place that card beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Woodland Sentinel
card.property: While this companion is at a forest site, he is strength +2.

card.name: The Art of Gandalf
card.property: To play, spot a [Gandalf] Wizard. Regroup: Stack a spell from hand here. Fellowship: Discard a [Gandalf] card from hand to take a card stacked here into hand.

card.name: Ease the Burden
card.property: Exert a [Gandalf] Wizard to remove a burden (or 2 burdens, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site).

card.name: Erland
card.property: To play, spot a [Gandalf] companion. Skirmish: Exert Erland to take a [Gandalf] skirmish event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Final Account
card.property: To play, exert a [Gandalf] Wizard. Discard 2 cards from hand to take a Free Peoples card and a Shadow card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: G for Grand
card.property: While you can spot a [Gandalf] Wizard, each companion who has resistance 6 or more is strength +1.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Bearer must be a Wizard. If bearer is Gandalf, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, choose a Shadow player who must wound a minion.

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Inspiration
card.property: Spot a [Gandalf] Wizard to reveal your hand and make a minion strength -3 for each companion in your hand (or -4 for each if the fellowship is at a battleground site).

card.name: New Authority
card.property: To play, spot a [Gandalf] Wizard. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden, you may remove (3). Response: If a minion uses its special ability, discard this condition to cancel the effect of that special ability.

card.name: New-awakened
card.property: Spell. Toil 2. (For each [Gandalf] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [Gandalf] Wizard to discard 2 conditions from play.

card.name: Prolonged Struggle
card.property: Exert a [Gandalf] Wizard and spot 2 companions who each have resistance 7 or more to wound a minion that Wizard is skirmishing twice.

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf is about to take a wound, you may add a burden to prevent that.

card.name: Frenzied Attack
card.property: If a minion is skirmishing a Free Peoples character who has resistance 2 or less, spot Gollum to wound that character twice.

card.name: Gollum
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice to make another minion strength +2.

card.name: Horribly Strong
card.property: Discard Gollum from play to wound an unbound companion who has resistance 6 or less.

card.name: Incited
card.property: Each time a companion loses a skirmish, you may exert Gollum to take a [Gollum] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Led Astray
card.property: Spot Gollum to add (3) and exchange one of your sites on the adventure path with another site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Master Commands It
card.property: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.name: No End of Wickedness
card.property: Exert Gollum to make another minion strength +2 (or +3 if Gollum is at a mountain site).

card.name: Not Yet Vanquished
card.property: Each time a companion loses a fierce skirmish, you may exert Gollum to add a burden.

card.name: One Good Turn Deserves Another
card.property: Spot Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site. Then you may add a burden to take this card back into hand.

card.name: Safe Passage
card.property: When you play this condition, name forest, mountain, plains, or river. Each time the fellowship moves to a site that has the named keyword, you may exert Gollum or Smeagol to remove (4).

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site. Skirmish: If Smeagol is at a marsh, exert him to cancel a skirmish involving him.

card.name: Strange and Terrible
card.property: Spot a [Gollum] minion at a mountain site to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Each time a Free Peoples skirmish event is played, you may exert Aragorn to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1).

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1).

card.name: Armor of the Citadel
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. While bearer is at a battleground site and unwounded, he or she is defender +1.

card.name: Battle Cry
card.property: Make a ranger strength +2 (or +3 if he or she is skirmishing a minion who has a damage bonus).

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [Gondor] companion.

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [Gondor] companion.

card.name: Bow of Minas Tirith
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. At the start of the archery phase, if bearer is at a battleground site, you may exert him or her to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Gondorian Blade
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a river site, he or she is damage +1.

card.name: The Highest Quality
card.property: Exert any number of [Gondor] companions who have total resistance 12 or more to make a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] companion strength -3 for each companion exerted this way.

card.name: Houses of Healing
card.property: When you play this condition, spot a [Gondor] Man to add 3 [Gondor] tokens here. Fellowship: Add (2) and either discard this condition or remove a [Gondor] token from here to heal a [Gondor] Man.

card.name: Madril
card.property: Ranger. Fellowship: If Madril is at a forest site, exert him to play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: Much-needed Rest
card.property: Heal each [Gondor] companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.name: Pledge of Loyalty
card.property: Make a [Gondor] companion strength +2 (or +3 if he or she has resistance 4 or more).

card.name: Ranger of Westernesse
card.property: Ranger. When you play this companion, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: Well-traveled
card.property: To play, exert a ranger. If the fellowship is in region 1, play the fellowship's next 2 sites. Otherwise, play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: Archer of Harad
card.property: Archer. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less, the minion archery total is +1.

card.name: Armored Easterling
card.property: Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a lurker strength +1. Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a lurker fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a lurker damage +1.

card.name: Axeman of Harad
card.property: While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, this minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Bloodthirsty
card.property: Spot 2 [Men] minions to wound an unbound companion.

card.name: Bold and Cunning
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Men] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [Men] minion to discard a possession from play.

card.name: Column of Easterlings
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a [Men] minion strength +4.

card.name: Corps of Harad
card.property: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is fierce.

card.name: Detachment of Haradrim
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion to add (1) for each companion who has resistance 5 or less.

card.name: Easterling Host
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Easterling Host and make it strength -2 until the regroup phase to make each other [Men] minion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Easterling Shield Wall
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If a [Men] minion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert this minion and remove (1) to prevent that.

card.name: Elder of Dunland
card.property: While this minion is at a plains site, it is damage +1.

card.name: Elevated Fire
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Men] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [Men] minion to make the minion archery total +3.

card.name: Fearsome Dunlending
card.property: Ambush (1). When you play this minion at a plains site, you may spot an unbound companion to make that companion resistance -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Ferocious Haradrim
card.property: Archer. Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, each of your [Men] minions is strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Fletcher of Harad
card.property: While this minion is at a plains site, it is an archer. While you can spot 6 companions, each [Men] minion is an archer.

card.name: Footman of Dunland
card.property: The fellowship's current site gains plains.

card.name: Force of Harad
card.property: When you cannot spot another [Men] minion, discard this minion.

card.name: Harad Standard-bearer
card.property: Skirmish: Remove (3) to make this minion damage +1.

card.name: Horde of Harad
card.property: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is fierce.

card.name: Invading Haradrim
card.property: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a skirmish, add (1) for each Free Peoples character who has resistance 5 or less.

card.name: Lathspell
card.property: To play, spot a [Men] minion. Bearer must be a companion. While bearer is skirmishing a [Men] minion, bearer loses from possessions all strength and damage bonuses.

card.name: Legion of Harad
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Men] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.name: Long Battle Bow
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Bearer is an archer. When you play this possession, you may make the Free Peoples player exert his or her Man.

card.name: Man of Bree
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each card in the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Oath Sworn
card.property: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you have 2 or more cards in hand, you may spot 2 [Men] minions and discard your hand to add (8).

card.name: Overrun
card.property: Make a [Men] minion strength +2 (or +4 if that minion is at a battleground or plains site).

card.name: Patroller of Haradrim
card.property: Each time this minion is assigned to a character who has resistance 5 or less, you may discard a possession borne by that character.

card.name: Pavise
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. The twilight cost of this possession is -1 for each Free Peoples possession you spot. Bearer cannot take wounds except during a skirmish.

card.name: Poleaxe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a [Men] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Precision Targeting
card.property: Spot a [Men] minion to make the minion archery total +1 and make the Free Peoples player choose 3 companions. Other companions cannot take archery wounds.

card.name: Raging Dunlending
card.property: When you play this minion, you may exert it to make it fierce until the regroup phase. While you can spot 6 companions, each [Men] minion is fierce.

card.name: Rampaging Easterling
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time another [Men] minion wins a skirmish, make this minion strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Squad of Haradrim
card.property: Regroup: Spot another [Men] minion and 2 Free Peoples characters who each have resistance 5 or less to make the move limit -1 for this turn.

card.name: Strange-looking Men
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion to transfer a possession or condition borne by a character to another eligible bearer.

card.name: Swarthy Bree-lander
card.property: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may remove (2) to transfer a condition borne by a character to another eligible bearer.

card.name: Throng of Harad
card.property: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a character who has resistance 5 or less, it is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Warrior of Dunland
card.property: Ambush (1). While this minion is at a plains site, it gains an additional ambush (1).

card.name: Whistling Death
card.property: Wound a character skirmishing a [Men] minion. If the fellowship is at a battleground site, you may remove (3) to wound that character again.

card.name: Wielding the Ring
card.property: To play, spot a [Men] minion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Armed for Battle
card.property: Spot your [Orc] minion to play an [Orc] possession from your discard pile (or, if that minion is at a battleground site, from your draw deck or discard pile).

card.name: Barbarous Orc
card.property: Skirmish: Exert another [Orc] minion to make this minion strength +2 (or +4 if this minion is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less).

card.name: Beastly Olog-hai
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Assignment: Exert this minion to assign it to a companion bearing an artifact. The Free Peoples player may discard an artifact from play to prevent this.

card.name: Bladed Gauntlets
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] minion. Bearer is a lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert bearer to make an [Orc] minion strength +2.

card.name: Bound to its Fate
card.property: Spot an [Orc] minion to reveal the Free Peoples player's hand. The Free Peoples player chooses to either discard a revealed Free Peoples event or add a burden.

card.name: Champion Orc
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Orc] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.name: Conquered Halls
card.property: Make an [Orc] minion strength +1 for each underground site you can spot.

card.name: Cutthroat Orc
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 5 or less.

card.name: Demoralized
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Each time a companion exerts, you may add (1) (or (2) if you can spot 6 companions).

card.name: Denizen of Khazad-dum
card.property: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +2.

card.name: Denizen of Moria
card.property: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +3.

card.name: Denizen of the Black Pit
card.property: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +2.

card.name: Dread and Despair
card.property: Spot 2 [Orc] minions to discard a condition from play. The Free Peoples player may discard the top 6 cards of his or her draw deck to prevent this.

card.name: Emboldened Orc
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) This minion is strength +1 for each companion who is not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Entrapping Orc
card.property: Assignment: Assign this minion to an unbound companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.name: Foraging Orc
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot another [Orc] minion and a companion who has resistance 3 or less to add (2).

card.name: Frenzied Orc
card.property: While this minion is at an underground site, each character skirmishing it is strength -2. While you can spot 6 companions, each character skirmishing an [Orc] minion is strength -2.

card.name: Goblin Hordes
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, you may take an [Orc] minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Goblin Hordes
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, you may take an [Orc] minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Hill Orc
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert each companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.name: Isengard Underling
card.property: When you play this minion, you may take an [Orc] event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Marauding Orcs
card.property: When you cannot spot another [Orc] minion, discard this minion from play.

card.name: Mocking Goblin
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player discards a Free Peoples event from hand.

card.name: Mordor Scimitar
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] minion. Each time bearer is assigned to skirmish a companion, you may exert that companion.

card.name: Mountain Orc
card.property: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a companion who has resistance 5 or less, exert that companion.

card.name: Orc Hammer
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc. When you play this possession, you may exert a companion.

card.name: Orc Miscreant
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Regroup: Exert this minion to add a burden.

card.name: Orkish Smith
card.property: When you play this minion, you may take an [Orc] condition from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Orkish Worker
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot another [Orc] minion to reveal the top card of the Free Peoples player's deck. If it is a Shadow card, add (X), where X is its twilight cost.

card.name: Persistent Orc
card.property: Each time this minion is about to be killed or discarded from play, you may spot another [Orc] card to place this minion on top of your draw deck instead.

card.name: Porter Troll
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [Orc] minion. When you play this minion, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player reveals a Free Peoples event from his or her hand.

card.name: Prowling Orc
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Remove (2) to make an [Orc] minion strength +1.

card.name: Scurrying Goblin
card.property: When you play this minion at an underground site, you may spot another [Orc] minion to add (2).

card.name: Skulking Goblin
card.property: The fellowship's current site gains underground.

card.name: Spurred to Battle
card.property: To play, exert an [Orc] minion. At the start of the Shadow phase, add (1).

card.name: Strength in Shadows
card.property: Make an [Orc] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is a lurker).

card.name: Undisciplined
card.property: Toil 3. (For each [Orc] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3.) Assign an [Orc] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Unyielding Goblin
card.property: Skirmish: If this minion is at an underground site, exert it to exert a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: Watchful Orc
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot another [Orc] minion to replace the fellowship's current site with an underground site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Border Patrol
card.property: When you play this condition, spot a mounted [Rohan] Man to add 3 [Rohan] tokens here. Response: If a minion is played at a plains site, discard this condition or remove a [Rohan] token from here to exert that minion.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, you may exert Eomer to return a minion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Each time Eowyn wins a skirmish, each other [Rohan] Man is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Gamling
card.property: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add (1) to play a possession on Gamling from your draw deck.

card.name: Hrothlac
card.property: Response: If a [Rohan] companion who has resistance 4 or more is about to take a wound, exert Hrothlac to prevent that.

card.name: Protecting the Hall
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Rohan] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Assignment: Discard this condition from play to make bearer defender +1.

card.name: Rally Cry
card.property: Make a [Rohan] Man who has resistance 4 or more strength +2 for each wound on each minion he or she is skirmishing.

card.name: Riddermark Javelin
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Archery: Discard this possession to make the fellowship archery total +1 (or +2 if the fellowship is at a plains site).

card.name: Riddermark Soldier
card.property: When you play this companion, each [Rohan] companion is strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Rider
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Riders of the Mark
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Rohan] companions. You may play Riders of the Mark any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Riders of the Mark, you may exhaust a minion.

card.name: Riding Like the Wind
card.property: To play, exert a [Rohan] Man. While you can spot 2 [Rohan] mounts, the move limit is +1. Each of your companions that is not mounted is strength -1.

card.name: Rohirrim Mount
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. While bearer is at a plains site, he or she is defender +1.

card.name: Rush of Steeds
card.property: To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. Each time a Shadow condition is played, you may exert a minion. Response: If a minion exerts as a cost of its special ability, discard this condition to prevent that and return that minion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sword Rack
card.property: Response: If a [Rohan] possession is discarded from play and no more than one possession is stacked here, stack it here. Fellowship: Add (1) to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While you can spot a [Gandalf] companion, Theoden gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While Theoden is at a battleground or plains site each [Rohan] Man is strength +1.

card.name: War Now Calls Us
card.property: Exert a [Rohan] companion to make him or her strength +3 (and damage +1 if he or she has resistance 5 or more).

card.name: Concerning Hobbits
card.property: For each dwelling and forest site on the adventure path, make a Hobbit strength +1.

card.name: Crouched Down
card.property: Stealth. Cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit and a minion whose strength is lower than that Hobbit's resistance.

card.name: Farmer Maggot
card.property: While Farmer Maggot is at a dwelling or forest site, he is strength +4.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. At the start of the regroup phase, you may exert Frodo to make him gain muster until the end of the regroup phase. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Habits of Home
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Shire] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a Hobbit. Limit 1 per bearer. Each time the fellowship moves from a dwelling or forest site, remove (1).

card.name: Hobbit Sword
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.name: Incognito
card.property: Stealth. If the fellowship is at a dwelling site, exert 2 Hobbits to cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, exert 2 Hobbits to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: Merry
card.property: For each other unbound companion assigned to a skirmish, Merry is strength +2.

card.name: The More
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Shire] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot 2 [Shire] companions to remove 2 burdens.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, spot an unbound companion who has less resistance than Pippin to have Pippin replace him or her in a skirmish.

card.name: Salt from the Shire
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is an unbound Hobbit, discard this possession to prevent him or her from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Sam
card.property: Ring-bound. Each other companion is resistance +1.

card.name: Sting
card.property: Bearer must be Bilbo, Frodo, or Sam. Maneuver: If bearer is Bilbo or Frodo, exert him to make another companion resistance +2 until the regroup phase. If bearer is Sam, each time he wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Sworn Companion
card.property: Make a Hobbit strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 7 or more.

card.name: A Task Now to Be Done
card.property: Spot X Hobbits to make an unbound Hobbit resistance +X.

card.name: Unharmed
card.property: Heal a Hobbit for each minion you spot.

card.name: Army of Uruk-hai
card.property: Damage +1. Each Free Peoples archer who has resistance 5 or less does not add to the Free Peoples archery total.

card.name: Bloodthirsty Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. While you can spot an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Brawling Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Response: If a special ability of a companion who has resistance 5 or less is used, exert this minion to cancel its effect.

card.name: Brutality
card.property: Make an [Uruk-hai] minion strength +1 for each battleground site you can spot.

card.name: Determined Uruk
card.property: To play, spot a [Uruk-hai] minion. Each time a companion exerts, you may draw a card.

card.name: Devastation
card.property: If your [Uruk-hai] minion wins a skirmish, discard a condition from play.

card.name: Feral Uruk
card.property: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: Force of Uruk-hai
card.property: Damage +1. Each time this minion is about to take a wound at a battleground site, you may spot another [Uruk-hai] card to make the Free Peoples player draw a card instead.

card.name: Fortitude
card.property: When you play this condition, spot an [Uruk-hai] minion to add 3 [Uruk-hai] tokens here. Response: If an [Uruk-hai] minion is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove an [Uruk-hai] token from here to prevent that.

card.name: Furious Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each companion and Free Peoples possession loses its special abilities.

card.name: Furor
card.property: Make an [Uruk-hai] minion strength +2 (or +3 if you can spot an exhausted companion).

card.name: Hounding Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. While you can spot an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Intimidating Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion at a battleground site, spot an unbound companion to make that companion resistance -2 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Invincible Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. While this minion is at a battleground site, it cannot take wounds. While you can spot 6 companions, each [Uruk-hai] minion cannot take wounds.

card.name: Isengard Siege Bow
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] minion. While bearer is at a battleground site, it is an archer.

card.name: Isengard Sword
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] minion. Each character skirmishing bearer is strength -2.

card.name: Lookout Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. The fellowship's current site gains battleground.

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Archer. Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Lurtz is strength +3 for each exhausted companion you can spot.

card.name: Murderous Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Our Foes Are Weak
card.property: To play, spot an [Uruk-hai] minion. Bearer must be an unbound companion. Limit 1 per bearer.

card.name: Overpowering Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While this minion is skirmishing a character who has resistance 3 or less, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Patrol of Uruk-hai
card.property: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing a Free Peoples character who has resistance 5 or less, this minion cannot take wounds.

card.name: Relentless Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Each time a Free Peoples event is played during a skirmish involving this minion, this minion is strength -2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Ruthless Uruk
card.property: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a character who has resistance 3 or less, you may exert this minion to discard a possession borne by that character.

card.name: Sentinel Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If an [Uruk-hai] minion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert or discard this minion to prevent that.

card.name: Squad of Uruk-hai
card.property: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing a character who has resistance 4 or less, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: Swarming Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. While you can spot another [Uruk-hai] minion assigned to a skirmish, this minion cannot take wounds.

card.name: Tyrannical Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Toil 1. (For each [Uruk-hai] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1.)

card.name: Vigilant Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) This minion is strength +2 for each [Uruk-hai] minion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Watchman Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion at a battleground site, you may draw a card.

card.name: Dark Powers Strengthen
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Wraith] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Dark Wings
card.property: Each time your [Wraith] minion wins a skirmish, you may discard this condition to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.name: Drawn to its Power
card.property: Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, add a burden.

card.name: Hatred Stirred
card.property: Each time a companion loses a fierce skirmish involving a [Wraith] minion, you may shuffle a [Wraith] card from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: Keening Wail
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Wraith] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to add a burden.

card.name: Lost in the Woods
card.property: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a companion your Nazgul is skirmishing. Limit 1 per companion. Each [Wraith] minion skirmishing bearer is strength +1 for each forest site you can spot.

card.name: Moving This Way
card.property: Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and reveal a Nazgul from hand to place the revealed card beneath your draw deck and draw a card.

card.name: The Pale Blade
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, each time he wins a skirmish, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.name: Riders in Black
card.property: Reveal your hand to make a [Wraith] minion strength +1 for each [Wraith] minion in your hand.

card.name: A Shadow Rises
card.property: Maneuver: Remove (5) to make this condition a fierce [Wraith] minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 10 strength and 3 vitality, and cannot bear other cards. This card is still a condition. At the start of the regroup phase, remove all tokens from here.

card.name: Shapes Slowly Advancing
card.property: Regroup: Discard your Nazgul from play to add a [Wraith] token here. The Free Peoples player may return a companion to hand to prevent the placement of that token. When you can spot 4 [Wraith] tokens on this condition, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

card.name: Surrounded by Wraiths
card.property: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a companion, that companion is exhausted unless the Free Peoples player pays its twilight cost again.

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

card.name: Ulaire Cantea
card.property: While Ulaire Cantea is at a forest or dwelling site, he is strength +2 and fierce.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Each character skirmishing Ulaire Lemenya who has resistance 5 or less is strength -3.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Ulaire Nertea
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) While Ulaire Nertea is at a forest site, he is strength +2. While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +2.

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [Wraith] card revealed this way into hand.

card.name: Ulaire Toldea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [Wraith] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. Toil 2. Muster.

card.name: Anduin Banks
card.property: River. The minion archery total is +2 for each companion in the fellowship over 4.

card.name: Anduin Confluence
card.property: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, discard each ally from play.

card.name: Barazinbar
card.property: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert a Dwarf to play a [Dwarven] possession from your draw deck.

card.name: Buckland Homestead
card.property: Dwelling. Shadow: Play a Nazgul to discard a condition from play.

card.name: Caras Galadhon
card.property: Forest. No more than 1 minion can be assigned to each skirmish.

card.name: Cavern Entrance
card.property: Underground. Skirmish special abilities cannot be used.

card.name: Chamber of Mazarbul
card.property: Underground. The Free Peoples player may transfer Free Peoples artifacts and possessions at no twilight cost.

card.name: Crags of Emyn Muil
card.property: Mountain. If this site is in region 2 when the fellowship moves from it during the regroup phase, wound each companion.

card.name: Dammed Gate-stream
card.property: Marsh. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may play a [Gollum] Free Peoples card from your draw deck.

card.name: East Road
card.property: Forest. Each companion is twilight cost +2.

card.name: Ettenmoors
card.property: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your character, (except an enduring character) to make it strength +2.

card.name: Expanding Marshland
card.property: Marsh. Shadow: If the total number of minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, play a minion at twilight cost -3.

card.name: Fangorn Glade
card.property: Forest. When the fellowship moves to this site, add (1) for each Free Peoples weapon.

card.name: Flats of Rohan
card.property: Plains. Each unbound companion skirmishing more than 1 minion is strength +3.

card.name: Fortress of Orthanc
card.property: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to the site, add 2 for each companion over 5.

card.name: Green Dragon Inn
card.property: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 2 Hobbits to play a Hobbit from your draw deck.

card.name: Harrowdale
card.property: Plains. Until the regroup phase, each minion skirmishing a [Rohan] companion loses fierce and cannot gain fierce.

card.name: Heights of Isengard
card.property: Battleground. Each time a [Gandalf] companion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player may discard a condition from play.

card.name: Helm
card.property: Battleground. Each character bearing a hand weapon is strength +2.

card.name: Mere of Dead Faces
card.property: Marsh. Regroup: Exert your Gollum or your Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: Moria Guardroom
card.property: Underground. When your fellowship moves from this site, you may spot a Dwarf to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Moria Stairway
card.property: Underground. Each character bearing a hand weapon is damage +1.

card.name: Neekerbreekers
card.property: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to here, heal each character who has resistance 5 or more and exert each other character.

card.name: North Undeep
card.property: River. The minion archery total is -3.

card.name: Old Forest Road
card.property: Forest. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may heal 2 Elves.

card.name: Osgiliath Reclaimed
card.property: Battleground. When the fellowship moves from this site, the Free Peoples player may spot 3 burdens to remove a burden.

card.name: Pelennor Fields
card.property: Plains. Each [Men] minion gains ambush 1.

card.name: Pelennor Flat
card.property: Plains. At the start of the maneuver phase, the Free Peoples player must add a burden or discard 3 cards from hand.

card.name: Pinnacle of Zirakzigil
card.property: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 3 companions to play a Wizard from your dead pile.

card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.property: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may add a burden to play a ranger from your draw deck.

card.name: Rohan Uplands
card.property: Plains. During the archery phase, ![URUK] minions cannot take wounds.

card.name: Slag Mounds
card.property: Battleground. Each time a companion is killed, add a burden.

card.name: Stables
card.property: At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert a [Rohan] Man to play a [Rohan] mount from your draw deck.

card.name: Trollshaw Forest
card.property: Forest. Each time you play an artifact or possession on your companion, you may draw a card.

card.name: Valley of the Silverlode
card.property: Dwelling. River. When your fellowship moves to this site, you may heal each Hobbit companion.

card.name: Watch-tower of Cirith Ungol
card.property: Mountain. Maneuver: Exert your [Orc] minion to discard a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: West Gate of Moria
card.property: Underground. When the fellowship moves from this site, remove (2).

card.name: Westemnet Village
card.property: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves to this site, the Free Peoples player wounds a companion for each ally.

card.name: Window on the West
card.property: Underground. Each unwounded [Gondor] Man is defender +1.

card.name: Woody-End
card.property: Forest. Shadow: Remove a burden to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: Elven Marksmanship
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Toil 2. (For each [Elven] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: At the start of the archery phase, you may spot another Elf to exert a minion.

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Gollum
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice to make another minion strength +2.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site. Skirmish: If Smeagol is at a marsh, exert him to cancel a skirmish involving him.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1).

card.name: Bloodthirsty
card.property: Spot 2 [Men] minions to wound an unbound companion.

card.name: Fletcher of Harad
card.property: While this minion is at a plains site, it is an archer. While you can spot 6 companions, each [Men] minion is an archer.

card.name: Porter Troll
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [Orc] minion. When you play this minion, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player reveals a Free Peoples event from his or her hand.

card.name: Undisciplined
card.property: Toil 3. (For each [Orc] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3.) Assign an [Orc] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Gamling
card.property: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add (1) to play a possession on Gamling from your draw deck.

card.name: Sword Rack
card.property: Response: If a [Rohan] possession is discarded from play and no more than one possession is stacked here, stack it here. Fellowship: Add (1) to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

card.name: Salt from the Shire
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is an unbound Hobbit, discard this possession to prevent him or her from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Brawling Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. Response: If a special ability of a companion who has resistance 5 or less is used, exert this minion to cancel its effect.

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Archer. Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Lurtz is strength +3 for each exhausted companion you can spot.

card.name: The Pale Blade
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, each time he wins a skirmish, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [Wraith] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)
